On-Page Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Do you know what searches users perform to get to your website? Can Google tell what your small business is about? Are your pages and images best optimized for both visitors and search engines?

If you’re working with Tin Cup Digital they are! We know how much getting found online matters for small businesses. That’s why on-page SEO is included in every website we design or redesign.

But we don’t just work with existing clients. We’re also here to help you optimize your current website, no matter who built it. We can even help you get set up with Google Local Search so your business listing stands out.

Inbound & Social Media Marketing Strategy

On-page SEO is just the first step to getting found online. Inbound marketing is about bringing potential customers to your website and social media accounts by giving them information they need.

Your customers ask for your expert advice in “real life.” They’ll come to you online, too. From how-to blog posts to handy infographics, templates, and videos, you can create content that makes your client’s (and potential clients!) lives easier while keeping them on your site or collecting their information.

Let us work with you to produce an inbound marketing strategy for identifying your buyer personas and coordinating blogging, social media, email marketing to best serve your business goals.

Asset Development & Marketing Support

Need a bank of blog posts produced? Want to develop a few downloadable assets to build up your email database? Need an email campaign written, designed, and developed?

We’ll help you develop online marketing assets to complement your inbound marketing strategy.

Need ongoing online marketing support? Ask us about developing an inbound retainer.
